tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: We are consulting Dr. Deepti since our child's birth. It has been 4 years of our association with the doctor. She is gem of a doctor. She understands the problem very well. Explains throughly and very patient in hearing the issues. She has treated my son in many different types of issues. Thanks her for all the treatment and support.

Very friendly doc. Heard our son's health issue patiently. Very happy with the professional behaviour of doctor
Great doctor and she explained things very clearly. Will recommend this doctor to everyone.
Only one problem here was queue management, appointment timings etc. which even after many feedbacks and suggestions see no improvement.
**** **** ****** * explains clearly. Went couple of times and she doesn't panic the parents at all.
She was friendly and understood the issue well. She explained about the diagnosis and the line of treatment which was quite satisfactory
